title: Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Narrow fragment of red cut and uncut velvet. Design (only a portion remains) of large vertically repeated group of flowers and foliage. Design in cut pile, ground in uncut pile. Details in the white satin foundation fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-46.
